cobblemon.move.hydrosteam.desc: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.
cobblemon.move.paleowave.desc: By using its prehistoric power, the user shoots out a wave of energy at the opponent. This may lower the opponent's Attack.
cobblemon.move.psyblade.desc: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.
cobblemon.move.shadowstrike.desc: The user cloaks itself in a black aura, and tackles the opponent. This may lower the opponent's Defense.
cobblemon.ability.mountaineer.desc: With its impressive climbing skills, the Pokemon avoids Rock type moves and Stealth Rock after switching in.
cobblemon.ability.persistent.desc: By using its strange powers, the Pokemon extends the effects of Room moves.
cobblemon.ability.rebound.desc: The Pokemon bounces certain status moves back to the opposing Pokemon after switching in.
cobblemon.species.wimpod.name: Wimpod
cobblemon.species.wimpod.desc1: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
cobblemon.species.wimpod.desc2: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.
cobblemon.species.amogite.name: Amogite
cobblemon.species.amogite.desc1: Waiting to evolve, it distracts itself with meaningless tasks in its natural habitat.
cobblemon.species.amogite.desc2: Some speculate it came from another planet, its population booming due to the lack of predators.
cobblemon.species.prolongus.name: Prolongus
cobblemon.species.prolongus.desc1: It spends its days training muscular legs by kicking down trees in shrouded mushroom forests and wooded cliffs.
cobblemon.species.prolongus.desc2: Its legs kick with otherworldly power. Some Prolongus fight each other in fatal competitions to train.
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.desc1: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.desc2: it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
cobblemon.species.yveltal.name: Yveltal
cobblemon.species.yveltal.desc1: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of
cobblemon.species.yveltal.desc2: every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
cobblemon.species.gimmighoul.name: Gimmighoul
cobblemon.species.gimmighoul.desc1: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.
cobblemon.species.gimmighoul.desc2: It lives inside an old treasure chest. Sometimes it gets left in shop corners since no one realizes it's actually a Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.cryptoil.name: Gholdengo
cobblemon.species.cryptoil.desc1: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.
cobblemon.species.cryptoil.desc2: It has a sturdy body made up of stacked coins. Gholdengo overwhelms its enemies by firing coin after coin at them in quick succession.
cobblemon.species.kingambit.name: Kingambit
cobblemon.species.kingambit.desc1: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.
cobblemon.species.kingambit.desc2: Though it commands a massive army in battle, it's not skilled at devising complex strategies. It just uses brute strength to keep pushing.
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.name: Landorus-Therian
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.desc1: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.desc2: Landorus soars through the sky in this form, bestowing plentiful harvests upon the land and earning the people’s reverence.
cobblemon.species.heatran.name: Heatran
cobblemon.species.heatran.desc1: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
cobblemon.species.heatran.desc2: Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds many mysteries.
cobblemon.species.phasmornyx.name: Phasmornyx
cobblemon.species.phasmorynx.desc1: The amulet around Phasmornyx's neck glows within the presence of powerful opponents. It dares others to fight it head-on.
cobblemon.species.phasmornyx.desc2: It can only see others when they are moving. It flies into a fit of rage whenever light shines into its eyes.
cobblemon.species.wooperpaldea.name: Wooper
cobblemon.species.wooperpaldea.desc1: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.
cobblemon.species.wooperpaldea.desc2: It's dangerous for Wooper to travel alone. They line up in groups of three or four and help each other as they walk around the wetlands.
cobblemon.species.clodsire.name: Clodsire
cobblemon.species.clodsire.desc1: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.
cobblemon.species.clodsire.desc2: It lives at the bottom of ponds and swamps. It will carry Wooper on its back and ferry them across water from one shore to the other.
cobblemon.species.regigigas.name: Regigigas
cobblemon.species.regigigas.desc1: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
cobblemon.species.regigigas.desc2: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
cobblemon.species.phantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.phantump.desc1: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
cobblemon.species.phantump.desc2: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.
cobblemon.species.trevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.trevenant.desc1: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
cobblemon.species.trevenant.desc2: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.
cobblemon.species.soulith.name: Soulith
cobblemon.species.soulith.desc: It weeps at any potential predators nearby. The souls it releases deters treasure seekers away.
cobblemon.species.gemirage.name: Gemirage
cobblemon.species.gemirage.desc: These fervent Pokemon patrol rigiously around caverns in search of hostiles. If one goes off schedule, all Gemirages nearby will enrage.
cobblemon.species.quarrdian.name: Quarrdian
cobblemon.species.quarrdian.desc: Unusually valiant and protective, these Pokemon guard the diverse underground. It is said that they only obey the Monitor of the Ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.name: Rotom-Wash
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.desc1: This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.desc2: The model of washing machine that Rotom can inspirit has been discontinued, so these appliances are now traded at high prices.
cobblemon.species.rotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc1: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc2: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.name: Rotom-Heat
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.desc1: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a convection microwave oven. It will sear the surrounding area with its burning heat, then smile in delight.
cobblemon.species.rotommow.name: Rotom-Mow
cobblemon.species.rotommow.desc1: The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.
cobblemon.species.rotommow.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.name: Rotom-Frost
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.desc1: This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.desc2: The special motor within the refrigerator is the key to bringing about Rotom's change in form.
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.name: Rotom-Fan
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.desc1: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.desc1: This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks, and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb the nutrients it finds within the stone.
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.desc2: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.
cobblemon.species.eronze.name: Eronze
cobblemon.species.eronze.desc: Eronze's body is made from an ancient metal alloy lost to modern science. It can withstand intense heat and force without the slightest bit of damage.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.name: Deoxys-Attack
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.name: Deoxys-Defense
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.name: Deoxys-Speed
cobblemon.species.skewor.name: Skewor
cobblemon.species.skewor.desc: They attack in coordinated and colorful bursts of kicks. They unusually have developed the ability to fly via kicking.
cobblemon.species.hollowdrupe.name: Hollow Drupe
cobblemon.species.hollowdrupe.desc: It appears to resemble a creature in a shady magazine. Its described to be responsible for the loss of 450 explorers.
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.name: Dragalisk
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.desc: It is seemingly made of an energy source that isn't from this world. Despite its size, it can shatter planets with a single blast.
cobblemon.species.gnoom.name: Gnoom
cobblemon.species.gnoom.desc: They are known as the Forest Apprentices for their links to witchcraft. They spray spores to practice their magic.
cobblemon.species.levisopod.name: Levisopod
cobblemon.species.levisopod.desc: A tale told that a statue came to life and attacked children who vandalised it. This Pokemon never moves when observed...
cobblemon.species.galaxeus.name: Galaxeus
cobblemon.species.galaxeus.desc: It seems to be an organism mimicking Arceus. Sentience within this Pokemon has yet to be confirmed.
cobblemon.species.lunaseeker.name: Lunaseeker
cobblemon.species.lunaseeker.desc: Every movement it does causes extreme pain, so it plans each hunt with fury unseen with any other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.moebilord.name: Moebilord
cobblemon.species.moebilord.desc: A cruel and malignant Pokemon, it cackles as it sprays scorching fire upon its victims, causing irremovable black burns.
cobblemon.species.gengarx.name: Gengar X
cobblemon.species.gengarx.desc1: Because its intelligence is exceptional, Gengar can communicate with any form of life. However, it uses this gift for not-so-ethical purposes.
cobblemon.species.raichux.name: Raichu X
cobblemon.species.raichux.desc: Gym Leader Surge's faithful companion, it has been brought back to life after a terrible accident. It is as fast as fragile.
cobblemon.species.ironmoth.name: Iron Moth
cobblemon.species.ironmoth.desc1: This Pokémon resembles an unknown object described in a paranormal magazine as a UFO sent to observe humanity.
cobblemon.species.ironmoth.desc2: No records exist of this species being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with an object described in an old book.
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.name: Tapu Koko
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.desc1: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity.
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.desc2: It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
cobblemon.species.tapulele.name: Tapu Lele
cobblemon.species.tapulele.desc1: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
cobblemon.species.tapulele.desc2: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.name: Tapu Bulu
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.desc1: The guardian deity of Ula’ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns.
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.desc2: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
cobblemon.species.tapufini.name: Tapu Fini
cobblemon.species.tapufini.desc1: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
cobblemon.species.tapufini.desc2: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.name: Lopunny-Mega
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.desc1: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.desc2: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.
cobblemon.species.shadowlugia.name: Shadow Lugia
cobblemon.species.shadowlugia.desc1: It is a Lugia corrupted by the criminal organization Cipher, believed to be the ultimate Shadow Pokémon and completely immune to purification.
cobblemon.species.galarianfarfetchd.name: Galarian Farfetch’d
cobblemon.species.galarianfarfetchd.desc: The Farfetch’d of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.
The stalks of leeks are thicker and longer in the Galar region. Farfetch’d that adapted to these stalks took on a unique form.
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.name: Sirfetch'd
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.desc1: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.desc2: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.
cobblemon.species.sneasler.name: Sneasler
cobblemon.species.sneasler.desc: Because of Sneasler’s virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
cobblemon.species.geigermite.name: Geigermite
cobblemon.species.geigermite.desc: A Magnemite's electrical waves influenced this inert rock to spring back to life. It is friendly and feeds on radiation.
cobblemon.species.geigerton.name: Geigerton
cobblemon.species.geigerton.desc: Geigermite multiply in vast quantities when they evolve, any scrap metal they could piece together were combined into a massive shell.
cobblemon.species.geigertron.name: Geigertron
cobblemon.species.geigertron.desc: The smartest Geigermite becomes the main brain of Geigertron. The rest fuse with the shell to become living armour.
cobblemon.species.brittaludon.name: Brittaludon
cobblemon.species.brittaludon.desc: Brittaludon are savage and coarse compared to their draconic relatives. They plunder every resource with brute force.
cobblemon.species.f00.name: F-00
cobblemon.species.f00.desc: This Pokemon resembles a particular character in Everlasting Memories. It is said to possess a heart so kind and gentle, likewise to a child.
cobblemon.species.f00mad.name: F-00 MAD
cobblemon.species.f00mad.desc: Pulling itself together, it wildly throws its entire body into targets. The noises it makes unsettle even the most confident of fighters.
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.name: Tapu Koko X
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.desc: One of Dragalisk's Elite Soldiers. A single dash can create a massive draft, powerful enough to blow down skyscrapers.
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.name: Tapu Bulu X
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.desc: One of the four beasts and X Elite Soldier. With its two horns, it could pin multiple opponents and deliver a fatal suplex.
cobblemon.species.shambloid.name: Shambloid
cobblemon.species.shambloid.desc: Although its alien to this world and a danger here, its apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
cobblemon.species.miascraft.name: Miascraft
cobblemon.species.miascraft.desc: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it commands a horde of Shambloids to attack and consume others. It is never seen eating.
cobblemon.species.erion.name: Erion
cobblemon.species.erion.desc: Erion is an industrial titan, ravenously consuming fuel and spewing it out as toxic smog. Plants and Pokémon in its wake wither and gasp for air.
cobblemon.species.erace.name: Erace
cobblemon.species.erace.desc: Thought to be damaged beyond repair, Erace was retrofitted with state-of-the-art technology. Its new, advanced body can even withstand atmospheric re-entry.
cobblemon.species.regirock.name: Regirock
cobblemon.species.regirock.desc1: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
cobblemon.species.regirock.desc2: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
cobblemon.species.regice.name: Regice
cobblemon.species.regice.desc1: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can’t be melted, even by magma.
cobblemon.species.regice.desc2: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.registeel.name: Registeel
cobblemon.species.registeel.desc1: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
cobblemon.species.registeel.desc2: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
cobblemon.species.ironhands.name: Iron Hands
cobblemon.species.ironhands.desc1: It is very similar to a cyborg covered exclusively by a paranormal magazine. The cyborg was said to be the modified form of a certain athlete.
cobblemon.species.ironhands.desc2: This Pokémon shares many similarities with Iron Hands, an object mentioned in a certain expedition journal.
cobblemon.species.latias.name: Latias
cobblemon.species.latias.desc1: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
cobblemon.species.latias.desc2: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
cobblemon.species.latios.name: Latios
cobblemon.species.iatios.desc1: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
cobblemon.species.iatios.desc2: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.desc1: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.desc2: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.name: Tyranitar X
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.desc: The Tyranitar owned by Dimension General Victor. It generates a defeaning buzz by vibrating its wings.
cobblemon.species.primaldialga.name: Primal Dialga
cobblemon.species.primaldialga.desc: Destabilisation of time has caused Dialga to become uncontrollable and phase in and out of existence.
cobblemon.species.metagroudon.name: Meta Groudon
cobblemon.species.metagroudon.desc: Said to be the embodiment of evil, this Groudon imposter consumes all with tendrils expanding from its spikes.
cobblemon.species.mewtwox.name: Mewtwo X
cobblemon.species.mewtwox.desc: Further modified genetically by an unknown corporation, its psychic powers have been amplified to frightening levels.
cobblemon.species.shadowmewtwo.name: Shadow Mewtwo
cobblemon.species.shadowmewtwo.desc: This Mewtwo has been enveloped by darkness, making it much more crueler than before. A singular punch can break a 10 ton truck.
cobblemon.species.subspacerayquaza.name: Subspace Rayquaza
cobblemon.species.subspacerayquaza.desc: Fused with a Mismagius to force obedience, this Rayquaza is in agony. It fires off enchanted spells from its eyes.
cobblemon.species.vroombug.name: Vroombug
cobblemon.species.vroombug.desc: It has an excellent balance and drives around running on a tire. Once the tire is worn out, it looks for a new one.
cobblemon.species.skravroom.name: Skravroom
cobblemon.species.skravroom.desc: Rival gangs compete for territories in races so loud, that it makes anyone run away.
cobblemon.species.beedrillx.name: Beedrill X
cobblemon.species.beedrillx.desc: The Beedrill formerly owned by an unknown individual. Its sting is incredibly viscous and sticky, trapping prey from the inside.
cobblemon.species.noiradux.name: Noiradux
cobblemon.species.noiradux.desc: It controls the wind with a strange organ, where it hides in harsh snowstorms. Then it jumps out at lightning fast speeds to snatch prey.
cobblemon.species.voitom.name: Voitom
cobblemon.species.voitom.desc: A kind of Ultra Beast. It is never seen in one consistent shape, always shifting between other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.voirochi.name: Voirochi
cobblemon.species.voirochi.desc: A fragment of an entity known as Dark Matter, it exudes extreme negative emotions. It holds the power of the Dragon type within it.
cobblemon.species.vakuum.name: Vakuum
cobblemon.species.vakuum.desc: Reality warps around its very presence. It emits a strange energy known as Fury Energy, sending all it comes across into a furious state.
cobblemon.species.morpeko.name: Morpeko
cobblemon.species.morpeko.desc1: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.
cobblemon.species.morpeko.desc2: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
cobblemon.species.musclekarp.name: Musclekarp
cobblemon.species.musclekarp.desc1: This Pokémon is the result of Magikarp adapting to living on land. Grounded predators have caused it to evolve this way.
cobblemon.species.musclekarp.desc2: It will pick up boulders and crush them with it's bare hands. Groups of Musclekarp will do this to compete for social dominance.
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.name: Aegislash X
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.desc: It's mentioned in legends as the companion of the First King. It uses its momentum to move at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.cacneax.name: Cacnea X
cobblemon.species.cacneax.desc: Because its appearance resembles a severed head, everyone who fights this Cacnea is scared to death.
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.name: Cacturne X
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.desc: Its internal body is made of a straw-like material. It shoots its needles to cast cursed spell against enemies.
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.name: Carvanha X
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.desc: It perpetually floats upside down on the surface of the water. Apparently, it doesn't feed on anything to survive.
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.name: Sharpedo X
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.desc: This Pokemon may have appeared long time ago, since very ancient sailors' tales already told of a creature used to devour ships to make them its den.
cobblemon.species.dittox.name: Ditto X
cobblemon.species.dittox.desc: Following a great number of experiments, it became extremely unstable, but it developed the ability to Transform even without seeing its target.
cobblemon.species.elekidx.name: Elekid X
cobblemon.species.elekidx.desc: The sparks it scatters from its head can easily cause fires or explosions. It is a real ticking bomb!
cobblemon.species.electabuzzx.name: Electabuzz X
cobblemon.species.electabuzzx.desc: Bumping its fists together, it creates strong explosions. It will discharge its fury around when enraged.
cobblemon.species.electaburst.name: Electaburst
cobblemon.species.electaburst.desc: The excessive energy unleashed during evolution split up its body. It combines thunders and flares to set off terrible explosions all around.
cobblemon.species.joltikx.name: Joltik X
cobblemon.species.joltikx.desc: They sneak up falling from the sky in large groups, so they can overcome their small size. Then they bring the prey to Galvantula.
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.name: Galvantula X
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.desc: It freezes the air around its nest. Then it traps prey in a thick ice web, slowly leading them to hypothermia.
cobblemon.species.pikachuxfemale.name: Pikachu X
cobblemon.species.pikachuxfemale.desc: It is a real anomaly between X Pokémon. Its nature makes it friendly even to human.
cobblemon.species.pikachuxmale.name: Pikachu X
cobblemon.species.pikachuxmale.desc: It is a real anomaly between X Pokémon. Its nature makes it friendly even to human.
cobblemon.species.ponytax.name: Ponyta X
cobblemon.species.ponytax.desc: A thick cloud mane makes it float in the air. It is still a green baby, so it can only clumsily fly around.
cobblemon.species.rapidashx.name: Rapidash X
cobblemon.species.rapidashx.desc: A peaceful tempered X Pokémon. However, if it gets furious, it wraps itself in thunderclouds and triggers raging lightning storms.
cobblemon.species.storm_rapidashx.name: Rapidash X
cobblemon.species.storm_rapidashx.desc: A peaceful tempered X Pokémon. However, if it gets furious, it wraps itself in thunderclouds and triggers raging lightning storms.
cobblemon.species.porygonx.name: Porygon-X
cobblemon.species.porygonx.desc: Porygon-X is an upgrade to Porygon, programmed by Professor Thorn. It is designed to translate quantum data between infinite realities.
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.name: Pyukumuku X
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.desc: It is way bigger than the actual Pyukumuku. Expelling its internal organs, it propels itself to strike its opponent.
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.name: Spiritomb X
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.desc: Some theories assert that this is Spiritomb's real appearence--it's the one we already know who comes from the Xenoverse.
cobblemon.species.ruspiratomb.name: Ruspiratomb
cobblemon.species.ruspiratomb.desc: This Pokemon seems to match the legends that detail a rusted possessed key controlling metal nearby. It does not display malice, instead playing pranks.
cobblemon.species.mechadexus.name: Mechadexus
cobblemon.species.mechadexus.desc: An unknown company constructed this Pokemon, enabling it to learn almost every move. It lacks a heart, unlike Mewtwo.
cobblemon.species.kiryanitar.name: Kiryanitar
cobblemon.species.kiryanitar.desc: It seems to have pre-dated the existence of Iron Thorns, possibly being a prototype. A fierce spark burns within it, matching Tyranitar's ferocity.
cobblemon.species.kiryanitarmkii.name: Kiryanitar MKII
cobblemon.species.kiryanitarmkii.desc: Exposure to the Star has upgraded its body with futuristic weaponry. Within its chest lies a core that can fire absolute zero beams!
cobblemon.species.blacktyranitar.name: Black Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.blacktyranitar.desc: Exposure to an unknown alien source has rendered it completely inert. It is being controlled by something else from the inside.
cobblemon.species.crystalonix.name: Crystal Onix
cobblemon.species.crystalonix.desc: Water does not phase it all, having conquered its fear thanks to its crystalised body. It even matches Steelix's body's hardness!
cobblemon.species.darkmiasma.name: Dark Miasma
cobblemon.species.darkmiasma.desc: This massive Haunter was once worshipped as a deity, with power getting into its head, it consumed all on its personal warpath.
cobblemon.species.excalibould.name: Excalibould
cobblemon.species.excalibould.desc: This rock pile came to life thanks to the combative spirits of paladins that inhabited the wedged sword.
cobblemon.species.madieval.name: Madieval
cobblemon.species.madieval.desc: It's said that the mystical energy which fills this Pokemon and makes its body float around is related to the Moon's influence.
cobblemon.species.corelios.name: Corelios
cobblemon.species.corelios.desc: Corelios drifts in warm oceans in search for lost Pokemon to care. It is always surrounded by loyal Brittaludons.
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.name: Scarphasmo
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.desc: Tales told of a mad scientist creating this Pokemon by combining different Pokemon parts. In reality, it is the manifestation of the fear of monsters.
cobblemon.species.ironthorns.name: Iron Thorns
cobblemon.species.ironthorns.desc2: It has some similarities to a Pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a Tyranitar from one billion years into the future.
cobblemon.species.ironthorns.desc1: Some of its notable features match those of an object named within a certain expedition journal as Iron Thorns.
cobblemon.species.megamewtwox.name: Mewtwo-Mega-X
cobblemon.species.megamewtwox.desc1: Psychic power has augmented its muscles. It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint a hundred meters in two seconds flat!
cobblemon.species.megamewtwoy.name: Mewtwo-Mega-Y
cobblemon.species.megamewtwoy.desc1: Despite its diminished size, its mental power has grown phenomenally. With a mere thought, it can smash a skyscraper to smithereens.
cobblemon.species.fazbear.name: Freddy Fazbear
cobblemon.species.fazbear.desc1: Freddy Fazbear was once a beloved animatronic performer, entertaining children and adults alike. However, when the curtains closed for the last time, a mysterious energy imbued it with spectral life.
cobblemon.species.fazbear.desc2: It roams the shadows of its former stage, reminiscing about its past glory. Its spectral and electric powers create an unsettling atmosphere that can unnerve even the bravest trainers. Approach with care and a brave heart.
cobblemon.species.bonnie.name: Bonnie the Bunny
cobblemon.species.bonnie.desc1: Legends say Bonnie the Bunny was brought to life by the lingering emotions of an abandoned music hall. This ghostly animatronic wanders in search of those it can entertain, its performances both captivating and eerie. Its ability to channel sound into power makes its songs truly mesmerizing.
cobblemon.species.bonnie.desc2: This creature, born from forgotten memories, can seamlessly transition between realms, leaving no footprints behind.
cobblemon.species.chica.name: Chica the Chicken
cobblemon.species.chica.desc1: Chica the Chicken roams abandoned areas, seeking to bring joy to the desolate. Its compassionate heart remains intact, and it uses its spectral powers to mend wounds and cure ailments among those it encounters.
cobblemon.species.chica.desc2: It is a spectral presence that embodies the playful yet eerie nature of a forgotten animatronic. It wanders dimly lit places, its ethereal form illuminated by a soft, otherworldly glow.
cobblemon.species.foxy.name: Foxy the Pirate
cobblemon.species.foxy.desc1: Legends say those who dare to face Foxy the Pirate find themselves caught in a dance of shadows, where only the quickest and most strategic prevail.
cobblemon.species.foxy.desc2: It haunts the night with its spectral presence. This mischievous spirit was once an animatronic entertainer, now returned as a ghostly enigma.
cobblemon.species.puppet.name: Marionette
cobblemon.species.puppet.desc1: It is known for its ability to manipulate and control objects with its spectral threads. Marionette's presence often brings a sense of unease, as it wanders silently, seeking solace for its tragic past.
cobblemon.species.puppet.desc2: Legends tell of its role in a bygone entertainment establishment, where it would mesmerize audiences with its graceful movements. Its Ghost typing reflects its connection to the afterlife, and its spectral abilities continue to intrigue those who encounter this mysterious animatronic Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.nightmarionne.name: Nightmarionne
cobblemon.species.nightmarionne.desc1: Nightmarionne's ethereal form is said to emerge from the darkest corners of the mind, materializing as a nightmarish apparition. It is said that its unsettling strings are woven from the threads of fear and anxiety.
cobblemon.species.nightmarionne.desc2: Known as a harbinger of unsettling dreams, Nightmarionne wanders the realm between dreams and reality. Its presence alone can induce a sense of unease, as it draws on the deepest fears hidden within the hearts of those it encounters.
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.name: Samurott-Hisui
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.desc1: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.desc2: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.name: Mawile-Mega
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.desc1: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.desc2: Its two sets of jaws thrash about violently as if they each had a will of their own. One gnash from them can turn a boulder to dust.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.name: Kyurem
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc1: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc2: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.tsubasa.name: Tsubasa
cobblemon.species.tsubasa.desc: This Pokemon is the first recorded instance of gender transition to meet criteria environment. It possesses a surprisingly cruel demeanour to those it seduces.
cobblemon.species.solzero.name: Solzero
cobblemon.species.solzero.desc: United by their trust in each other, they attack in coordination. It is said that their undying bond has made them massively popular.
cobblemon.species.astro.name: Astro
cobblemon.species.astro.desc: Within is a Gallade's mind, erased of any memory. It displays a destructive urge to destroy its foes.
cobblemon.species.regirode.name: Regirode
cobblemon.species.regirode.desc: No matter how many times it tries to rebuild itself, it always falls apart.
cobblemon.species.regimourn.name: Regimourn
cobblemon.species.regimourn.desc: Seeing its own children become withered and decayed has sent it into a great depression. Some say it had learned the dark arts to revive them.
cobblemon.species.komura.name: Komura
cobblemon.species.komura.desc: A special Riolu, imbued with the power of shadows thanks to its cloak. The auras it reads are of higher concentration.
cobblemon.species.chorutite.name: Chorutite
cobblemon.species.chorutite.desc: A violent Pokemon that fires off energy balls whenever it has been seen. It is said to be highly intelligent.
cobblemon.species.choruton.name: Choruton
cobblemon.species.choruton.desc: Chorutite have fused together to create a gateway to another dimension. They forcibly drag others through that portal using their psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.choreudo.name: Choreudo
cobblemon.species.choreudo.desc: This Pokemon is made up of Chorutite colonies fused together. Within this hive mind lies a raging dragon.
cobblemon.species.bitterwind.name: Bitter Wind
cobblemon.species.bitterwind.desc: This resembles a beast from the Scarlet Book. Folklore spoke of it being a resurrected form of an unknown terror from another dimension.
cobblemon.species.bongbong.name: BongBong
cobblemon.species.bongbong.desc: A special agent from Lobotomy Corporation. It's said that it joined the company in search of the hot Fixer, but hardly anyone knows what that means.
cobblemon.species.megalatias.name: Latias-Mega
cobblemon.species.megalatios.name: Latios-Mega
cobblemon.species.perskullsion.name: Perskullsion
cobblemon.species.perskullsion.desc: It vibrates its whole body to create harsh noises in an effort to impress hard to please Pokemon. It is said to be a big carer of many small Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.reginalous.name: Reginalous
cobblemon.species.reginalous.desc: Its body is formed by Anomalous energy from various dimensions. It creates strong winds of bright pink color that changes the alterations of each dimension.
cobblemon.species.klick.name: Klick
cobblemon.species.klick.desc: Klick were said to be created by Dialga to stabilise time whenever it was absent. Klink appears to be its modern relative.
cobblemon.species.klock.name: Klock
cobblemon.species.klock.desc: Klock's dial forever keeps time. Many say that the dial only stops when reality finally ends.
cobblemon.species.klicklock.name: Klicklock
cobblemon.species.klicklock.desc: Named the Emissary of Time, it summons Paradox Pokemon to do its bidding. All Paradox Pokemon are forced to obey it, no matter what.
cobblemon.species.celdum.name: Celdum
cobblemon.species.celdum.desc: A creation of Giratina, said to be the first inhabitant of the Distortion World. It observes our world with interest.
cobblemon.species.centang.name: Centang
cobblemon.species.centang.desc: Centang often escorts a small swarm of Celdum, providing some muscle. Despite its appearance, it is a caring Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.centigross.name: Centigross
cobblemon.species.centigross.desc: Nicknamed 'The Shadowy Duke,' Centigross only appear when a distortion of space or time has occured, usually to fix it.
cobblemon.species.bear5.name: Bear5
cobblemon.species.bear5.desc: This glitched anomaly exhales near absolute zero temperatures, distorting life around it. Approach with caution.
cobblemon.species.ironchamp.name: Iron Champ
cobblemon.species.ironchamp.desc1: Iron Champ possesses a massive database that encompasses all of humanity's martial arts, making it a lethal weapon in hand-to-hand combat. Its six floating arms are linked by magnetic waves emitted by its belt and can be disconnected from it at a distance of 100 meters. Each blow has the impact power of a fast bullet train.
cobblemon.species.megalucario.name: Lucario-Mega
cobblemon.species.megalucario.desc1: Its aura has expanded due to Mega Evolution. Governed only by its combative instincts, it strikes enemies without mercy.
cobblemon.species.megalucario.desc2: Bathed in explosive energy, its combative instincts have awakened. For its enemies, it has no mercy whatsoever.
cobblemon.species.megasalamence.name: Salamence-Mega
cobblemon.species.megasalamence.desc1: Anyone standing in its path gets sliced right in two, while this Pokémon continues its flight without interruption.
cobblemon.species.megasalamence.desc2: Mega Evolution fuels its brutality, and it may even turn on the Trainer who raised it. It’s been dubbed “the blood-soaked crescent.”
cobblemon.species.megametagross.name: Metagross-Mega
cobblemon.species.megametagross.desc1: Its intellect surpasses its previous level, resulting in battles so cruel, they’ll make you want to cover your eyes.
cobblemon.species.megametagross.desc2: When it knows it can’t win, it digs the claws on its legs into its opponent and starts the countdown to a big explosion.
cobblemon.species.megaswampert.name: Swampert-Mega
cobblemon.species.ultranecrozma.name: Ultra Necrozma
cobblemon.species.armoredmewtwo.name: Mewtwo-Armored
cobblemon.species.megagengar.name: Gengar-Mega
cobblemon.species.megagengar.desc1: It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
cobblemon.species.megagengar.desc2: Mega Evolution has made it possible for Gengar to access other dimensions. Its entire body is brimming with strange power.
cobblemon.species.badegg.name: Bad Egg
cobblemon.species.badegg.desc: This Pokemon takes the guise of an egg to attack unsuspecting victims. It supposedly punishes children who try to take advantage of cheats.
cobblemon.species.questionmark.name: Question Mark
cobblemon.species.questionmark.desc: This is a newly discovered Pokemon. It is currently under investigation. No detailed information is available at this time.
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.name: Porygon-WES
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.desc: It was updated with the most cutting-edge technology ever created. It was originally meant to be an assistant in PokéWES.
cobblemon.species.vilesla.name: Vilesla
cobblemon.species.vilesla.desc: Known as the Naval Mine of The Abyss, Vilesla floats at the bottom of the ocean, before suddenly lunging at prey. Nobody can escape the 4 chains of Vilesla.
